reviewText: George Papageorge presents a decent program on the subject of reaching kids. This body of work is good for a graduate student recap, or the educator, or counseling clergy. The material is presented in clear terms,  and the price of the DVD is easy on the wallet.

George Papageorge's talk is engaging, funny, and most importantly, very helpful. He offers sound and practical advice on how to communicate effectively with our children. By telling us about the many unsuccessful ways we try to parent our kids, he helps us realize why we need to listen, to be truly there and just listen.
